sentences.en: A resident said, "I think we should write it down on paper or tell our family members.
sentences.cn: 一位居民说：“我觉得我们应该把遗嘱写在纸上或者告诉给自己的家人。

sentences.en: a resident tutor
sentences.cn: 住校辅导老师

sentences.en: As one local resident put it in May, "By day there is government.
sentences.cn: 正如一位当地居民在五月份对它的描述”白天有政府。

sentences.en: Few of her former comrades enjoy this comfort; but, as another resident explained, the authorities like them to live there "to do propaganda and education work".
sentences.cn: 她以前的同志，很少人能享受能这种舒适生活；不过另一个居民解释说，当局希望他们住在那以“进行宣传教育工作”。

sentences.en: He became one of my best collaborators, a resident conscience, and a close friend.
sentences.cn: 他成了我最好的合作者之一, 是我永恒的知己和密友.

sentences.en: He has a non - resident account with a French bank.
sentences.cn: 他在一家法国银行拥有外国人账户.

sentences.en: He moved to Belgium in 1990 to live with his son, who had been resident in Brussels since 1967.
sentences.cn: 他于1990年搬到比利时和儿子一起住。他儿子自1967年起就住在布鲁塞尔。

sentences.en: I would get the neurosurgery resident down here.
sentences.cn: 我想请神经外科住院医师下楼到这儿来.

sentences.en: I've been resident in this place for five years.
sentences.cn: 我已经在这个地方住了五年.

sentences.en: Many retired British people are now resident in Spain.
sentences.cn: 许多退休的英国人现在住在西班牙。

sentences.en: Non-resident guests are welcome to use the hotel swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 欢迎非旅馆住客使用本旅馆的游泳池。

sentences.en: Please page the surgical resident for emergency room.
sentences.cn: 请叫外科住院医师到急诊室来.

sentences.en: Similar arrangements apply to students who are ordinarily resident in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 类似的安排适用于长期居住在苏格兰的学生。

sentences.en: Some of the royal family of Spain are resident in Portugal.
sentences.cn: 西班牙王室的一些成员居住在葡萄牙.

sentences.en: The archbishop called on the government to build more low cost homes for local residents.
sentences.cn: 这位大主教呼吁该政府为当地居民建更多的廉价住宅。

sentences.en: The hall was reserved exclusively for resident or corresponding members.
sentences.cn: 大厅是专门为本地会员或着通讯会员准备的.

sentences.en: The paper said that 100,000 non-resident workers would have to be sent back to their home villages.
sentences.cn: 报纸上说10万名暂住工人将不得不被遣送回乡。

sentences.en: the residents of Westville
sentences.cn: 韦斯特维尔的居民

sentences.en: They engaged a resident tutor.
sentences.cn: 他们聘用了一名住家的家庭教师.

sentences.en: This block of flats has a non - resident caretaker.
sentences.cn: 这座公寓的管理员不在公寓里住.

sentences.en: This design of resident buildings is becoming / getting fashionable.
sentences.cn: 这种住宅楼的设计正在逐渐流行起来.

sentences.en: This is your resident DJ signing off for another week with our signature tune.
sentences.cn: 这是本台流行音乐唱片节目主持人,现在播放信号曲来结束我们为您安排的这一星期的节目.

phrases.tran_cn: 生化危机（原为日本恐怖游戏，后改编为电影）

trans.tran_cn: 居民，旅客，住院实习医生
trans.tran_en: someone who lives or stays in a particular place
